attributes.action: Let children be aloud to dye their hair any colour in secondary schools.
attributes.additional_details: Make it so children can show individuality and uniqueness in personalising themselves. It shows differences without hurting nor damaging anyone/ their education.
attributes.background: Make it so schools let children dye their hair any colours, without getting in trouble/consequences.

rejection.details: Decisions about allowing pupils to dye their hair are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. You may wish to raise this issue with your school.
